sentences.english: Yossi Benayoun is determined to prove to Arsène Wenger that he made the right decision to sign him this summer.
sentences.chinese: 贝纳永下决心要证明温格在今年夏天没有看错人。

sentences.english: We read the world wrong ang say that it deceives us.
sentences.chinese: 我们把这个世界看错了，反说它欺骗我们。

sentences.english: We read the world wrong and say that it deceives us.
sentences.chinese: 我们把世界看错了，反说他欺骗我们。

sentences.english: Yep, you read that headline right.
We read the world wrong and say that it  deceives us.
sentences.chinese: 我们把世界看错了，反说它欺骗我们。

sentences.english: Yes, what you read is right.
We reposting the world wrong excellentd say that it deceives us.
sentences.chinese: 我们把世界看错了，反说它棍骗我们。

sentences.english: We read the world wrong and say that it deceives.
sentences.chinese: 我们把世界看错了，反说它欺骗我们了。

sentences.english: I noticed his shoes. I’d been wrong about them.
sentences.chinese: 我注意到他的鞋子，我之前看错了。

sentences.english: It could be, of course, that these funds are simply miscalculating.
sentences.chinese: 当然，也许这些基金看错了。

sentences.english: That was shop-bought cake if ever I saw one.
sentences.chinese: 如果我没看错的话，那蛋糕是从商店里买来的。
